TopicTitle: I need idea's for a new mission

Articles.Content: May be rather difficult for a new player, but a Jool-5 mission is always fun. If that's too hard (which it is lol), do a "grand tour"-esque mission where you go to as many celestial bodies as you can (mining helps)

Visit Dres.

Make a probe and use gravity assists to send it to flyby every single celestial object.
